summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Solid Waste Utility; providing for the issuance of Solid Waste Utility Revenue Bonds of the City for the purpose of refunding all or a portion of the outstanding Solid Waste Utility Revenue bonds, 1986, issued pursuant to Ordinance 112944 and for the purpose of carrying out additions to and betterments and extensions of the Solid Waste Utility; directing the City comptroller to negotiate the sale and deliver of those bonds and to recommend their principal amount interest rates and other details consistent with a subsequent ordinance authorizing the issuance of bonds and a subsequent resolution of the City Council specifying the details of the sale.
